titleStmt.title: The declaration of the gentlemen, merchants, and inhabitants of Boston, and the countrey adjacent, April 18th, 1689
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

notesStmt.note: The declaration is an order for the arrest of the officers of the Andros government, written by Cotton Mather.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
